[Notes]
Wherever I’ve written F#m, you can switch between F#m and F#sus4. The F#sus4 is what he uses for the riff
by moving his finger down from the 4th string, 4th fret to the 3rd string, 4th fret.
Where I’ve written “A Asus2” it’s A with either a hammer-on to the 2nd string, 2nd fret, or a pull-off.
